page.title: 08Family Life
page.content: Mum,Dad,me and my 3 brothers go to see Gran in Narborough on Saturdays, sometimes staying for tea.On Sundays we go to Enderby pool and stay in for 2 hours.Afterwards we sometimes drive to Burbage Common for a walk or picnic.On Christmas Day we visit Gran for a party and a game of cards. Sometimes in summer we go fishing at Launde Abbey.We often walk at weekends.On Saturdays we may go to Borough Hill to fly my kite.When it's raining we watch TV and play board games inside.Some evenings I help Mum box jewellery for a factory;I may help Dad make a new chicken or duck pen.On birthdays we have a small party for friends.In July we have a holiday in the Lake District,sleeping in a tent and fishing in a lake.
